name: The Grayrooms (tech demo)
description:
"The Grayrooms" is a simple horror game where you try to escape. You don't know how you got there, the only thing you know is you need to get out. The only thing you have is a flashlight that can be recharged at recharge stations. Don't lose your sanity!

This is a tech demo, hence several assets used are more proof of concept. The Game should still be challenging.

WS to walk, E to recharge Flashlight (at station), Esc to Quit
